options.text: Default value of text input option

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT SUM(octetDeltaCount), (sourcePodName, destinationPodName, destinationIP) AS pair
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
AND flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY pair
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT SUM(octetDeltaCount), (sourcePodName, destinationPodName, destinationIP) AS pair
FROM default.flows_pod_view
WHERE flowEndSeconds >= toDateTime(1642531723) AND flowEndSeconds <= toDateTime(1642533523)
AND flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY pair
targets.rawSql:
select SUM(octetDeltaCount) as bytes, 
CONCAT(sourcePodNamespace, '/', sourcePodName, ':', CAST(sourceTransportPort as VARCHAR)) as source, 
CONCAT(destinationPodNamespace, '/', destinationPodName, ':', CAST(destinationTransportPort as VARCHAR)) as destination
From flows_pod_view
WHERE flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
AND destinationPodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
AND $__timeFilter(flowEndSeconds)
GROUP BY source, destination

options.text: Default value of text input option

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT SUM(reverseOctetDeltaCount), (sourcePodName, destinationPodName, destinationIP) AS pair
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
AND flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY pair
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT SUM(reverseOctetDeltaCount), (sourcePodName, destinationPodName, destinationIP) AS pair
FROM default.flows_pod_view
WHERE flowEndSeconds >= toDateTime(1642531743) AND flowEndSeconds <= toDateTime(1642533543)
AND flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY pair
targets.rawSql:
select SUM(reverseOctetDeltaCount) as bytes, 
CONCAT(sourcePodNamespace, '/', sourcePodName, ':', CAST(sourceTransportPort as VARCHAR)) as source, 
CONCAT(destinationPodNamespace, '/', destinationPodName, ':', CAST(destinationTransportPort as VARCHAR)) as destination
From flows_pod_view
WHERE flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
AND destinationPodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
AND $__timeFilter(flowEndSeconds)
GROUP BY source, destination

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT $timeSeries as t, SUM(throughputFromSourceNode), sourcePodName
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter 
AND flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY sourcePodName, t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT (intDiv(toUInt32(flowEndSeconds), 60) * 60) * 1000 as t, SUM(throughputFromSourceNode), sourcePodName
FROM default.flows_pod_view
WHERE flowEndSeconds >= toDateTime(1642532448) AND flowEndSeconds <= toDateTime(1642534248) 
AND flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY sourcePodName, t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawSql:
SELECT $__timeInterval(flowEndSeconds) as time, 
CONCAT(sourcePodNamespace, '/', sourcePodName, ':', CAST(sourceTransportPort as VARCHAR), ' -> ', destinationPodNamespace, '/', destinationPodName, ':', CAST(destinationTransportPort as VARCHAR)) as pair, 
AVG(throughput)
FROM flows_pod_view
WHERE flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
AND destinationPodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
AND $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY time, pair
HAVING AVG(throughput) > 0
ORDER BY time

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT $timeSeries as t, SUM(throughputFromSourceNode), sourcePodName
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter 
AND flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY sourcePodName, t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT (intDiv(toUInt32(flowEndSeconds), 60) * 60) * 1000 as t, SUM(throughputFromSourceNode), sourcePodName
FROM default.flows_pod_view
WHERE flowEndSeconds >= toDateTime(1642532448) AND flowEndSeconds <= toDateTime(1642534248) 
AND flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY sourcePodName, t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawSql:
SELECT $__timeInterval(flowEndSeconds) as time, 
CONCAT(sourcePodNamespace, '/', sourcePodName, ':', CAST(sourceTransportPort as VARCHAR), ' -> ', destinationPodNamespace, '/', destinationPodName, ':', CAST(destinationTransportPort as VARCHAR)) as pair, 
AVG(reverseThroughput)
FROM flows_pod_view
WHERE flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
AND destinationPodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
AND $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY time, pair
HAVING AVG(reverseThroughput) > 0
ORDER BY time

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT $timeSeries as t, SUM(throughputFromSourceNode), sourcePodName
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter 
AND flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY sourcePodName, t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT (intDiv(toUInt32(flowEndSeconds), 60) * 60) * 1000 as t, SUM(throughputFromSourceNode), sourcePodName
FROM default.flows_pod_view
WHERE flowEndSeconds >= toDateTime(1642532448) AND flowEndSeconds <= toDateTime(1642534248) 
AND flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY sourcePodName, t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    $__timeInterval(flowEndSecondsFromSourceNode) as time,
    CONCAT(sourcePodNamespace, '/', sourcePodName, ':', CAST(sourceTransportPort as VARCHAR)) as src,
    SUM(throughputFromSourceNode)
FROM (
    SELECT
        $__timeInterval(flowEndSecondsFromSourceNode) AS flowEndSecondsFromSourceNode,
        sourcePodName,
        sourcePodNamespace,
        sourceTransportPort,
        AVG(throughputFromSourceNode) AS throughputFromSourceNode
    FROM flows_pod_view
    WHERE flowType IN (1, 2)
    AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
    AND destinationPodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
    AND $__timeFilter(flowEndSecondsFromSourceNode)
    GROUP BY
        flowEndSecondsFromSourceNode,
        sourcePodName,
        sourcePodNamespace,
        sourceTransportPort,
        destinationPodName,
        destinationPodNamespace,
        destinationTransportPort,
        protocolIdentifier
    HAVING throughputFromSourceNode > 0
    ORDER BY flowEndSecondsFromSourceNode
)
GROUP BY
    time,
    src
ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT
    sourcePodNamespace,
    SUM(octetDeltaCount)
FROM flows_pod_view
WHERE flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
AND destinationPodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
AND $__timeFilter(flowEndSecondsFromSourceNode)
GROUP BY
    sourcePodNamespace
HAVING SUM(octetDeltaCount) > 0

panels.title: Cumulative Bytes of Source Pod Namespace

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT $timeSeries as t, SUM(throughputFromSourceNode), sourcePodName
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter 
AND flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY sourcePodName, t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT (intDiv(toUInt32(flowEndSeconds), 60) * 60) * 1000 as t, SUM(throughputFromSourceNode), sourcePodName
FROM default.flows_pod_view
WHERE flowEndSeconds >= toDateTime(1642532448) AND flowEndSeconds <= toDateTime(1642534248) 
AND flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY sourcePodName, t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    $__timeInterval(flowEndSecondsFromDestinationNode) as time,
    CONCAT(destinationPodNamespace, '/', destinationPodName, ':', CAST(destinationTransportPort as VARCHAR)) as dst,
    SUM(throughputFromDestinationNode)
FROM (
    SELECT
        $__timeInterval(flowEndSecondsFromDestinationNode) AS flowEndSecondsFromDestinationNode,
        destinationPodName,
        destinationPodNamespace,
        destinationTransportPort,
        AVG(throughputFromDestinationNode) AS throughputFromDestinationNode
    FROM flows_pod_view
    WHERE flowType IN (1, 2)
    AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
    AND destinationPodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
    AND $__timeFilter(flowEndSecondsFromDestinationNode)
    GROUP BY
        flowEndSecondsFromDestinationNode,
        sourcePodName,
        sourcePodNamespace,
        sourceTransportPort,
        destinationPodName,
        destinationPodNamespace,
        destinationTransportPort,
        protocolIdentifier
    HAVING throughputFromDestinationNode > 0
    ORDER BY flowEndSecondsFromDestinationNode
)
GROUP BY
    time,
    dst
ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT
    destinationPodNamespace,
    SUM(octetDeltaCount)
FROM flows_pod_view
WHERE flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
AND destinationPodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
AND $__timeFilter(flowEndSecondsFromDestinationNode)
GROUP BY
    destinationPodNamespace
HAVING SUM(octetDeltaCount) > 0

panels.title: Cumulative Bytes of Destination Pod Namespace
